main event: A newspaper man observed an object hovering over the ground near Columbus, New Mexico at 4:00 AM on July 9, 1957.
interesting points: The object was round with a reddish glow., The object moved from the ground to an altitude of about 1000 feet., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The sighting occurred at night., The case was later investigated as part of Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a round object with a reddish glow
